Project9.Name: MCP AI Agent
Project9.Highlight: Integrated Agent Based on MCP Technology
Project9.Details: Last updated in May 2025. Through simple conversations, AI can now use various tools to automate the completion of complex tasks. Just like humans use apps, AI can now also utilize apps—for example, opening websites, generating files, creating 3D models, and more.

Project8.Name: AI Database
Project8.Highlight: 基于MCP技术, 通过简单的对话准确地智能分析超大型数据库.
Project8.Details: 最后更新于Apr-2025.基于MongoDB和MCP技术, MongoDB可以对大量数据进行高级运算和筛选, 可以突破传统LLM的Token限制, 最终实现了一个智能的数据库.

Project7.Name: API vs GUI
Project7.Highlight: 一个解释API和GUI Agent的视频

Project6.Name: Browser Operator Agent
Project6.Highlight: 一个可以像人类一样操作浏览器的AI Agent
Project6.Details: 最后更新于Mar-2025. 通过预设任务, 让AI Agent像人类一样操作浏览器, 突破传统爬虫的限制, 可以对浏览器进行任何操作, 可以获取任何信息.

Project5.Name: Amazon AI Chat
Project5.Highlight: 基于Amazon SPAPI的数据, 实现的AI聊天机器人

Project4.Name: Zendesk X Netsuite Actions AI
Project4.Highlight: 获取Zendesk关于Netsuite的工单信息, 并自动创建/修改Netsuite订单.
Project4.Details: 最后更新于Feb-2025. 实时获取Zendesk的工单信息. 用AI技术分析工单内容, 获取用户的目的和Netsuite的操作类型. 根据用户的目的和操作类型 自动创建/修改Netsuite订单. 提供日志记录功能, 方便管理员查看订单创建/修改的完整过程.

Project3.Name: Kaxi
Project3.Details: Last updated in Feb 2025. Implements 90% of Uber’s features within Chatbox, supporting user management, address selection, route selection, vehicle type selection, order creation, order completion, and more.

Project2.Name: Zendesk AI Agent
Project2.Highlight: An intelligent agent that integrates Zendesk knowledge base with ticket management operations.
Project2.Details: Last updated in January 2025. It utilizes RAG technology to retrieve information from the Zendesk knowledge base, providing users with timely responses. Users can quickly create tickets via the chatbox and communicate with ticket administrators in real-time. Administrators can swiftly view tickets through the chatbox and perform intelligent analysis of functionalities.

Project1.Name: Meeting Assistant
Project1.Highlight: A browser extension that integrates ASR, TTS, and AI functionalities into online meetings.
Project1.Details: Last updated in January 2025. Product highlights include support for customizable APIs for ASR, TTS, and AI services, enabling low-cost operation of the meeting assistant. It also supports setting different language tones for TTS and allows users to customize their own voice.

Project0.Name: SmartDove
Project0.Details: Last updated in September 2019. Product highlights: Transform ordinary, mundane text into trendy, buzzworthy expressions popular on the internet, or convert it into more engaging and captivating language.
